meanings.definition: Ranunculuses: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The ranunculuses in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted ranunculuses in my backyard for their colorful petals.
meanings.sent3: The ranunculuses in the flower bed seemed to be gossiping with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her love for ranunculuses was as deep as the roots of the plants themselves.
meanings.sent5: The ranunculuses danced in the breeze, their petals like delicate skirts twirling.
